definitions.definition: An event or enterprise that ends suddenly and disastrously , often with humiliating consequences .
A breaking up of a natural dam , usually made of ice , by a river and the ensuing rush of water.

main_definition: An event or enterprise that ends suddenly and disastrously , often with humiliating consequences . [from early 19th c.]
secondary_definitions: ( ecology ) A breaking up of a natural dam , usually made of ice , by a river and the ensuing rush of water.
